1.speaker: A
sentence: Sorry to keep you waiting. So where were we?
미안해요 너를 기다리게 해서. 그래서 우리 어디까지 했죠?

2.speaker: B
sentence: We need to fix the date for the next meeting.
우리 필요해 날짜를 확정하다 다음 미팅을 위해.

3.speaker: A
sentence: When is the most convenient time for you?

4.speaker: B
sentence: Too bad I'm not able to make time this week.
안타깝게도 아는 가능하지 않아요 시간을 내는게 이번주에.

5.speaker: A
sentence: Try to look on the bright side.

6.speaker: B
sentence: Got it. Keep me posted on your progress.
알았어요. 내게 계속 알려주세요 너의 진행상황을
